short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get answers from chatGPT anywhere while browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You have to input your api key into the extension popup
Use GPTHere extension to get chatgpt responses on most websites on any content

GPTHere aims to make access to chatgpt answers as easy and as simple as normal browsing without any other steps to make it as native as possible to the user
 ‚û°Ô∏èCan Inquire about some text in a page ?
 ‚û°Ô∏èCan fill an Email without copy pasting ?
 ‚û°Ô∏è Can to have a conversation on any text field ? 
 ‚û°Ô∏è Can answer any question you highlight in place

Here's how it works:

‚û°Ô∏è Simply select any online text or write your own and select it

‚û°Ô∏è Right click and hover GPTHere , you will have 4 options : -
= 1 - replace: this will replace this entire text with the answer

2 - append : this will add the answer to the end of this text

3 - insert : this will Insert the answer after the text I highlighted

4- Revert : this will get the page back to the way it was


‚û°Ô∏è And voila! The Answer is right there at your finger tip and copid to your clipboard

‚û°Ô∏èExtra features {optional} :-
 üî• Add a chat url to the extension popup page to have continues chats
 üî• Add Your User Name and password to the extension popup to allow for auto logging if you are logged out

‚û°Ô∏è‚û°Ô∏èNotes:
üî• - no data is being collected

‚ö†Ô∏è This is a beta version so it may not work on all websites the expected way / ever
